content.rendered:
Directed by Prem.

Written by Malavalli Saikrishna.

Cast Shivarajkumar(Ramappa). Sudeep(Rama / Ravana). Amy Jackson(Sita). Meka Srikanth(Kaisar). Mithun Chakraborty(Inspector). Markus Waldow(Hitman, Sniper) . Pavan Acharya(Police officer (voice)). Samyuktha Hornadu(Self – Guest Appearance).Angela Krislinzki.Lokesh Kumar.Sharath Lohitashwa. Zivile Matikiene(Posh Tourist). Parvez Patwary Milon(Milon khan).Muniraju. Radhika Narayan(Self – Guest Appearance (as Radhika Chetan)).Saranya Ponvannan.Kote Prabhakar.Petrol Prasanna.Kuri Prathap. Rachita Ram(Self – Guest Appearance).Mandya Ramesh.Aravind Rao. Bhavana Rao(Self – Guest Appearance).Thilak Shekar.Shobharaj. Shraddha Srinath(Self – Guest Appearance). Shanvi Srivastava(Self – Guest Appearance). Leyton Benta(Tourist (uncredited)). Craig Buckingham(Bodyguard (uncredited)). Peter Cerlienco(Musician (uncredited)). Alvaro Flores(Joker (uncredited)). Shaj Goku(Tourist (uncredited)). James Heron(Tourist with sunglasses (uncredited)). Gurnita Kaur Kahlon(Passerby (uncredited)). Tori Lao-Lee(Dancer (uncredited)). Noor Lila(Tourist (uncredited)). Kevin Matadeen(Tourist (uncredited)). Kati Mocho(Tourist (uncredited)). Luke Richards(Henchman (uncredited))

Language Kannada.

Producers Rengarajan Jaiprakash. C.R. Manohar. Hitesh Patel. Ramesh. Suresh.

Production Tanvi Shanvi Film.
